name: face-cursor.js
description: jQuery plugin to 3D transform elements relative to the cursor position
author: Matthias Vogt

scripts.build: if "$NODE_ENV" != production; then gulp build; else echo "Unavailable in production because of missing devDepencencies" && exit 1; fi
scripts.rebuild: if "$NODE_ENV" != production; then npm run clean && npm run build; else echo "Unavailable in production because of missing devDepencencies" && exit 1; fi
scripts.start: if "$NODE_ENV" != production; then gulp; else echo "Unavailable in production because of missing devDepencencies" && exit 1; fi
scripts.test: echo "Tests are located in the `/test` directory." && exit 0
